languages.text: "Но вы не можете. Мы посреди варп-шторма — без навигатора, знающего обратный путь, вы погибните". {n}Кассия улыбается — холодно и жестоко. Как вы, порой, когда вершите чужие судьбы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Но вы не можете. Мы посреди варп-шторма — без Навигатора, знающего обратный путь, вы погибните". {n}Кассия улыбается — холодно и жестоко. Как вы, порой, когда вершите чужие судьбы.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но вы не можете. Мы посреди варп-шторма — без навигатора, знающего обратный путь, вы погибните". {n}Кассия улыбается — холодно и жестоко. Как вы, порой, когда вершите чужие судьбы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「それはできません。私たちは〈歪み〉の嵐の中心にいるのです。戻る道を知る航宙士がいなければ死ぬだけです」{n}カシアの笑顔は冷たく残酷だ。あなたが人民の運命を決めるときの顔にうりふたつだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはできません。私たちは〈歪み〉の嵐の中心にいるのです。戻る道を知る航宙士がいなければ死ぬだけです」{n}カシアの笑顔は冷たく残酷だ。あなたが人民の運命を決めるときの顔にうりふたつだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “你走不了，因为我们正处于亚空间风暴之中。如果没有导航者指引你踏上归途，你必死无疑。”{n}卡西娅的笑容冷酷无情，正如你决定他人命运时那样。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你走不了，因为我们正处于亚空间风暴之中。如果没有导航者指引你踏上归途，你必死无疑。”{n}卡西娅的笑容冷酷无情，正如你决定他人命运时那样。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas. La tempête Warp fait toujours rage. Sans l'aide d'un navigateur, vous ne vous en sortiriez pas {mf|vivant|vivante}. » {n}Le sourire de Cassia est glacial, voire cruel. Un peu comme le vôtre lorsque vous décidez du destin des autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas. La tempête Warp fait toujours rage. Sans l'aide d'un navigateur, vous ne vous en sortiriez pas {mf|vivant|vivante}. » {n}Le sourire de Cassia est glacial, voire cruel. Un peu comme le vôtre lorsque vous décidez du destin des autres.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «No puede. Estamos en mitad de una tormenta de la disformidad. Sin un Navegante que conozca el camino de vuelta, está perdid{mf|o|a}». {n}La sonrisa de Cassia es fría y cruel. Justo igual que la tuya cuando decides el destino de otras personas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No puede. Estamos en mitad de una tormenta de la disformidad. Sin un Navegante que conozca el camino de vuelta, está perdid{mf|o|a}». {n}La sonrisa de Cassia es fría y cruel. Justo igual que la tuya cuando decides el destino de otras personas.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das könnt Ihr nicht. Wir sind inmitten eines Warpsturms. Ohne Navigator, der den Rückweg kennt, seid Ihr verloren." {n}Cassias Lächeln ist so kalt wie grausam. Genau wie das deine, wenn du über das Schicksal anderer entscheidest.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das könnt Ihr nicht. Wir sind inmitten eines Warpsturms. Ohne Navigator, der den Rückweg kennt, seid Ihr verloren." {n}Cassias Lächeln ist so kalt wie grausam. Genau wie das deine, wenn du über das Schicksal anderer entscheidest.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Gidemezsin. Bir öteboyut fırtınasının ortasındayız. Geri dönüş yolunu bilen bir Rotacı olmaksızın ölüme mahkûmsun." {n}Cassia'nın gülümsemesi, başkalarının kaderine karar verirkenki gülümsemelerin gibi soğuk ve gaddarca.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You can't. We are in the middle of a warp storm. Without a Navigator who knows the way back, you are doomed." {n}Cassia's smile is cold and cruel. Just like yours is whenever you decide the fate of others.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gidemezsin. Bir öteboyut fırtınasının ortasındayız. Geri dönüş yolunu bilen bir Rotacı olmaksızın ölüme mahkûmsun." {n}Cassia'nın gülümsemesi, soğuk ve gaddar... Başkalarının kaderine karar verirken kendi gülümsemen gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
